name: Peanut Butter Granola Bars
author: missrochester
summary: These make a wonderful healthy treat! Use chopped nuts in place of or with the dried fruit if you like.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped dried mixed fruit
directions: Melt peanut butter and honey together in a saucepan over medium heat
Dissolve brown sugar into the peanut butter mixture; bring to a simmer for 2 minutes
Mix granola, oats, rice cereal, chocolate chips, and fruit together in a large bowl; pour peanut butter mixture over the granola mixture and fold to coat
Pour the granola mixture into the prepared pan and press into a flat layer
Cool at room temperature until set, about 15 minutes before cutting into bars
